proposal: Diving into the world of open source with ASF's impressive 320+ projects and 8,400+ committers, it's clear you're shaping the future, one commit at a time. 🌍 With just 1 holder in the ETH network, imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further empower your community, turning every contribution into a chance to grow together. Let's blend our B2B tools with your vision for public good, creating more than just software, but a thriving ecosystem.
